title: Masked shaco needs a rework
body: Masked shaco looks nice on the wallpaper but in game he has a pink or red ugly mask and that bothers me a lot. Riot should change this because the pink mask looks ugly and dull.

replies.body:
Hey TheNorthChild! 

For something like this, I would recommend posting threads like these on the **[Story, Art & Sound](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art)** board, or the **[Miscellanous](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous)** board, as this isn't a bug. 

Side note, I actually worked on this skin. At this time, we don't have plans to made adjustments to this skin.
I was about to say he's talking about a visual update for Shaco because that one unmasked skin looked better than base. But there's actually a skin redundantly named Masked Shaco, wow.
